thread.title: Win: holiday in Spain

author: The Telegraph
title: Win: holiday in Spain
text: 1. This prize draw is open to residents of the UK, Channel Islands, Isle of Man and Republic of Ireland aged 18 years or over, except employees of Telegraph Media Group Limited and its group companies, and BAI SA (“Brittany Ferries”), their families, agents or anyone else professionally associated with the draw. 2. Details of how to enter form part of the terms and conditions. It is a condition of entry that all rules are accepted as final and that the competitor agrees to abide by these rules. The decision of the judges is final and no correspondence will be entered into. 3. Entries must be submitted via www.telegraph.co.uk/brittanyferries and entry is restricted to one per person. Once submitted, entries cannot be amended in any way. 4. Late, illegible, incomplete, defaced or corrupt entries or entries sent through agencies and third parties will not be accepted. No responsibility can be accepted for lost entries and proof of submission of an entry will not be accepted as proof of its receipt. The winner will be drawn at random from all entries received by the closing date. The winner’s name and county can be obtained by sending a sae to Brittany Ferries Prize Draw Winner, SPARK, Telegraph Media Group, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT within one month after the closing date of the prize draw. 5. All entries must be received by midnight on Sunday, August 30, 2015. 6. The winner will be contacted within 14 days of the closing date of the prize draw. Should the Promoter be unable to contact the winner or should the winner be unable to accept the prize, the Promoter reserves the right to award the prize to an alternative winner, drawn in accordance with these terms and conditions. 7. The prize as described is available on the date of publication. Should the prize become unavailable, a substitute of equal value shall be provided. 8. One winning entrant will win a four night break for two with Brittany Ferries.The prize package comprises: • Return ferry travel for two people travelling in a standard car (5m long by 1.83m high) from either Portsmouth or Plymouth to Santander; • Two nights on-board accommodation based on two people sharing a two-berth inside cabin; and • Two nights accommodation in a Brittany Ferries Spanish Parador of the winner’s choice, based on two people sharing a twin or double room on a bed and breakfast basis. 9. The prize must be taken as one package. 10. The prize does not include travel insurance, food and drink, personal expenditure or incidental costs, other than where mentioned. It is the responsibility of the prizewinner to ensure they have a valid passport and travel insurance and obtain any necessary vaccinations and visas for their trip. 11. The prize is valid for travel from September 25, 2015 and all travel must be completed by December 23, 2016.The prize excludes travel during the following periods: July and August 2016; the Christmas and New Year’s period; Easter; and May bank holidays. Once confirmed, the booking cannot be amended. The winner and their guest must travel together at all times. Brittany Ferries standard terms and conditions apply which can be found at www.brittany-ferries.co.uk/information/ferry-conditions . 12. The prize is subject to sailing schedules and availability, is non transferable and there are no cash alternatives. 13. The winner may be required to participate in reasonable publicity on behalf of the Promoter and Brittany Ferries. 14. Events may occur that render the prize draw itself or the awarding of the prize impossible due to reasons beyond the control of the Promoter and accordingly the Promoter may at its absolute discretion vary or amend the promotion and the entrant agrees that no liability shall attach to the Promoter as a result thereof. 15. The Telegraph is responsible for the first part of the promotion, which is the publication and adjudication of the prize draw. Provision of the prize is the responsibility of Brittany Ferries. Promoter: Telegraph Media Group Limited, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT.
